articles.title: Intel To Discontinue 8th Gen Coffee Lake Desktop CPUs, Flagship Core i7-8700K Goes EOL Too - Wccftech
articles.description: Intel has announced the discontinuation of its  8th Generation Coffee Lake Desktop CPU lineup including the flagship Core i7-8700K. A total of 31 desktop parts and 3 mobile CPUs featured in Intel's 8th Generation lineup will reach EOL status this year. Intel …
